title: Keycloak 23.0.3 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   BUGS   * PubKeySignRegisterTest failures in WebAuthn tests testsuite  * Deadlock when pre-loading remote sessions from external Infinispan storage  * Remove sign out action for offline sessions admin/ui  * Make password visibility css classes configurable for themes login/ui  * Meaning of briefRepresentation query parameter is inverted in    GroupResource.getSubGroups admin/api  * RealmAdminResource.getGroupByPathGroup does not work with space in path    parameter admin/api  * CORS issue in 'openid-connect/certs' endpoint oidc  * User Profile: If required roles ("user") and reqired scopes are set, the    required scopes have no effect user-profile  * Parsing of labels issue IDs doesn't work with colons and the "fixes" keyword    ci  * Backchannel logout token is missing the "exp" claim oidc  * HTML emails in Catalan don't contain links translations
